mapper.select: SELECT distinct li.lecture_year FROM student s JOIN lecture_apply la ON s.student_id = la.student_id JOIN lecture_info li ON la.lecture_id = li.lecture_id WHERE s.STUDENT_ID = #{studentId};

SELECT li.lecture_year, li.LECTURE_NAME, li.LECTURE_ID FROM student s JOIN lecture_apply la ON s.student_id = la.student_id JOIN lecture_info li ON la.lecture_id = li.lecture_id WHERE s.STUDENT_ID = #{studentId};

SELECT li.lecture_name, li.lecture_year, li.LECTURE_CONTENT AS subjectContent, p.name AS profName, p.phone_no AS tel, p.email, lt.lecture_day, lt.lecture_time, lt.classroom, c.curriculum_name FROM student s JOIN lecture_apply la ON s.student_id = la.student_id JOIN lecture_info li ON la.lecture_id = li.lecture_id JOIN prof p ON li.instructor_no = p.prof_id JOIN lecture_time lt ON li.lecture_id = lt.lecture_id JOIN curriculum c ON li.curriculum_id = c.curriculum_id WHERE s.STUDENT_ID = #{studentId} AND li.lecture_year = #{lectureYear} AND li.lecture_name = #{lectureName};

SELECT clw.lecture_week, clw.start_date, clw.end_date, ls.lecture_contents FROM curriculum_lecture_week clw JOIN lecture_schedule ls ON clw.week_id = ls.week_id JOIN lecture_info li ON ls.lecture_id = li.lecture_id JOIN lecture_apply la ON li.lecture_id = la.lecture_id JOIN student s ON la.student_id = s.student_id WHERE s.STUDENT_ID = #{studentId} AND li.lecture_year = #{lectureYear} AND li.lecture_name = #{lectureName};
